randawagena sitina sarath fonseka mahathata awashya siyalu pahasukam kisidu aduwakin thorawa sapaya athi bawa da penwa dun janadhipathithuma awashya nam ohuta thaman athadanguwata ganima pilibandawa shreshtadhikaranayata yamata da awashya pahasukam salasa athayi sandahan kale ya.esema sarath fonseka mahatha pilibanda wimarshana katayuthu kadinamin kriyawata nanwana bawa pawasu janadhipathithuma ohu waradak kara nomathi nam nidahas kirimata katayuthu karana bawa da pawasiya.randawagena sitina sarath fonseka mahathata awashya aahara pana gena yamata anoma fonseka mahathmiya wenuwata wenath ayaku yedawiya haki dayi mehidi ranil wikramasinha mahatha wimasa sitiye ya.janadhipathithuma sandahan kale eya hamudapathithuma wisin thiranaya kala yuthu bawayi.
